title: about me
text: MarkDown Basics

title: Home
text:
I was born and raised in Orem, UT all my life.



Since beginning college in the fall of 2019 I have lived in Pennsylvania, Maryland, Delaware, New Jersey, Virginia, South Dakota, and Idaho.
I’ve also traveled abroad to Mexico, Honduras, Belize, Puerto Rico, London, France, Switzerland, Italy, Austria, Lichtenstein, and Germany.


Since traveling, and through simple personal growth, I’ve come to see the world as far more makeshift and maleable in the hands of those who learn to shape it. The skills incorporated by data scientists, computer scientists, and business analysis—all of which I am—endeavor to create and protect a better world.
MarkDown Basics

title: Andrew Seaman’s CV
text:
Business Analyst | Computer & Data Scientist | Public Speaker


LinkedIn Phone Email

title: Andrew Seaman’s CV
text:
Currently


    
    
        Institution:
        Brigham Young University - Idaho
    
    
    
        Academic Year:
        Junior, On-campus, Undergrad
    
    
    
        Expected graduation:
        Fall of 2026
    
    
    
        Dedicated to studying, diligence, and hard work. Intrinsically motivated towards excellence in menial and major tasks desiring personal success for public gain. Creativity, discovery, and personal interest drive a habit of learning at all times in various fields of interests.
    




    
    
        Personal Passions
    
    
    
        Music
        Art collecting
        Participation in sports
        Computer science
        Systemization and efficiency exploration
    




    
    
        Degrees in Pursuit
    
    
    
        Bachelor of Science in Business Analytics
        Minor in Computer Science
    


Specialized in


    
    
    
        
            Topics
        
        
            Business Analytics
            Data Science
            Computer Science
        
    

    
    
        
            Programming Languages
        
        
            Python
            C#
            MySQL
            R
            Markdown (HTML5; Quarto)
            CSS
        
    

    
    
        
            Technologies
        
        
            Excel
            Google Sheets
        
    

    
    
        
            Soft Skills
        
        
            Public Speaking
            Spanish Fluency
            Writing
            Organization
            Teamwork
            Conflict Resolution
        
    



Research interests


    
        Machine learning
        Data structures
        Advanced data modeling and predictive analysis for business efficiency

title: Andrew Seaman’s CV
text:
Education

    
    
        
        
            Brigham Young University - Idaho
            Rexburg, Idaho
        
        
        
            Bachelor of Science in Business Analytics
            Fall 2019 - Present
        
        
        
            Junior, On-Campus Student
            Active in Sales Society, Men’s Choir, and Beginning Orchestra
            Minor in Computer Science
        
    


    
    
        
        
            Orem High School
            Orem, Utah
        
        
        
            High School Diploma
            September 2016 - May 2019
        
        
        
            GPA: 3.97, Graduated with Honors
            Member of National Honors Society (2015-2019)
            Activities: Cross Country Team, Club Soccer, Advanced Choir, Drama
            Completed Spanish, French, AP, and Honors Classes

text: MarkDown Basics

title: Andrew Seaman’s CV
text:
Work Experience


    
    
        Vantage Marketing
        Sioux Falls, South Dakota & Orem, Utah
    
    
    
        Sales Account Manager & Recruiter
        November 2023 - Present
    
    
    
        Engaged in active recruitment for top-performing sales team members.
        Performed door-to-door sales for Insight Pest Control.
        Contributed to a team that historically produces $2.5 million in serviced revenue annually.
    




    
    
        Greenix Pest Control
        Delaware & Pennsylvania
    
    
    
        Sales Account Manager
        July 2023 - August 2023
    
    
    
        Executed door-to-door sales with a focus on customer service and relationship building.
        Collaborated with a team that collectively produced $1.2 million in serviced revenue.
    




    
    
        Pointe Marketing
        Maryland & Virginia
    
    
    
        Sales Account Manager
        March 2023 - July 2023
    
    
    
        Executed door-to-door sales for Frontline Pest Control.
        Contributed to a team that collectively produced $1.8 million in serviced revenue.
    




    
    
        Malawi's Pizza
        Orem, Utah
    
    
    
        Dishwasher, Busser, Line Cook, Cashier
        June 2015 - October 2017
    
    
    
        Cleaned dishes in a high-paced environment.
        Prepared food at multiple stations, including pizza, pasta, and salad.
        Trained in cashier operations, handling payments and customer interactions.
    




    
    
        The Bella Bazar
        Lehi, Utah
    
    
    
        Executive Assistant
        January 2015 - December 2016
    
    
    
        Streamlined setup processes.
        Improved customer service standards.
        Ensured proper food handling and upheld sanitation protocols.

title: Andrew Seaman’s CV
text:
Service


    
    
        The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
        Pennsylvania, New Jersey & Delaware
    
    
    
        Full-Time Volunteer Minister - Spanish Speaking
        September 2020 - October 2022
    
    
    
        Commissioned to serve communities, frequently relocating to assist in proselytizing efforts.
        Collaborated with local leaders and communities to support humanitarian initiatives.
        Directed under leadership of President Daniel F. Dunnigan and President Justin Harding.
    




    
    
        Humanitarian Especially for Youth
        Merida, Yucatan, México
    
    
    
        Volunteer Builder - Spanish Speaking
        July 2018
    
    
    
        Played a key role in construction of a school's foundation alongside local workers.
        Supported young and abused girls reclaimed from abusive families for protection and success.
    




    
    
        The Boy Scouts of America (BSA)
        Orem, Utah
    
    
    
        Eagle Scout
        January 2012 - December 2018
    
    
    
        Achieved esteemed rank of Eagle Scout after 7 years (December 2018).
        Earned merit badges through skill development and community engagement. These experiences contributed to enrichment as a citizen.

title: Andrew Seaman’s CV
text:
Extra Curricular


    
    
        Choral Artist
        Orem, Utah & Rexburg, Idaho
    
    
    
        Tenor Vocalist
        September 2013 - April 2020
    
    
    
        Involved in 6 choirs; Institutions (3):
    
    
    
        Canyon View Jr. High School
        Orem High School
        Brigham Young University - Idaho
    




    
    
        The Utah Ambassadors of Music
        Utah, USA & European Nations
    
    
    
        European Choir Tour Nominee & Participant
        September 2018 - July 2019
    
    
    
        Selected as a three-time nominee for The Utah Ambassadors of Music.
        Nominated by Sterling Keys, high school choir director, for participation in the bi-annual European Choir Tour (2019).
        Concert host countries included:
        
            London
            France
            Switzerland
            Austria
            Italy
            Germany
